name: lyrion-music-server
description: Slimserver (Logitech Media Server) is a self-hosted streaming platform for music playback. It supports multi-room audio, plugins, and a variety of streaming clients for local or networked media collections.

features.title: Real-Time Sync
features.description: Synchronized playback, Multiple zones, Group players. Play music throughout your home

features.title: Plugin System
features.description: Extend functionality, Streaming services, Custom features. Add capabilities with plugins

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Web interface, Mobile apps, Hardware players. Access music from any device

features.title: Library Management
features.description: Automatic scanning, Metadata management, Playlist support. Organize your music library

features.title: REST API
features.description: Web-based control, Mobile control, API access. Control playback from anywhere
